## Review

_Congratulations, you've completed this exercise and mastered UV for Python development!_

<img src="https://octodex.github.com/images/jetpacktocat.png" alt="celebrate" width=200 align=right>

Here's a recap of your accomplishments:

- ✅ Installed UV and verified your setup
- ✅ Created a Python project with a specific version (3.12)
- ✅ Added and managed dependencies with `uv add`
- ✅ Ran code and tests seamlessly with `uv run`
- ✅ Managed multiple Python versions (3.11 and 3.12)
- ✅ Exported production dependencies to requirements.txt
- ✅ Built a working calculator application with tests!

You now have the skills to use UV for modern Python development. UV will make your Python workflow faster, more reliable, and easier to manage!

### What's next?

- [UV Documentation](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/) - Learn about advanced UV features
- [Astral Blog](https://astral.sh/blog) - Stay updated on UV and other Astral tools
- Try using UV in your next Python project!
- Explore UV's support for workspaces and monorepos
- Learn about `uv sync` for team collaboration
